subject: Tennis
lead_paragraph: Maria Sharapova, a three-time Grand Slam champion who has not played a competitive match since July because of a shoulder injury, will return to the women’s tour this week in Indian Wells, Calif. Sharapova, 21, will not compete in the singles competition but will compete in the doubles tournament with Elena Vesnina, according to a statement on her Web site.
